text: Aspidosperma darienense is a species of plant in the family Apocynaceae. It is native to Panama, Colombia, Ecuador, French Guiana, and northern Brazil.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families It is threatened by habitat loss.Mitré, M. 1998. Aspidosperma darienense. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
